name: The King
text:
so... you've arrived! 
strongest warrior in the world 
holder of the [red: ShadowZ ]

name: Kantro
text:
It's an honor to meet you,
 [yellow: your majesty]

name: The King
text: Hmm? But I see you alone... looks like [lime: the other one ] turned down my offer

name: Kantro
text: That's correct, But lets get to the important matters

name: The King
text: I take it you've accepted my offer?

name: Kantro
text:
yes, but first! 
I have a few terms...
